Related repos

  • Sends notifications to many services
  • turn emails into push notifications for your devices
  • Go library for sending notifications to messaging services
  • Push notifications to iPhone via API or self-hosted server
  • Monitors Reddit and RSS feeds and sends notifications to Discord, Slack, or Mattermost
  • List of various APIs for developers
  • Python backend with auto-generated APIs and multi-tenancy
  • Go library for WhatsApp web multidevice API, supports messaging, group management, and notifications
  • Request toolkit for high-performance API integration
  • headless email client API for IMAP, SMTP, Gmail, MS Graph
